parameters.name: ParameterGroupId
parameters.description: The parameter template ID. You can call the DescribeParameterGroups operation to query the parameter template ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute to obtain the resource group ID.
